content: Anup BhattacharyaSearch this siteEmbedded FilesSkip to main contentSkip to navigationI am a faculty at the School of Computer Sciences, NISER, Bhubaneswar. Earlier, I was a postdoctoral researcher at the Indian Statistical Institute, Kolkata and the University of Bonn in Germany. I completed my PhD in the Department of Computer Science and Engineering at IIT Delhi under the supervision of Prof. Ragesh Jaiswal.  Research interests: Algorithm design, Randomized algorithms. Details of my publications can be found here, and DBLP, Google Scholar.  Contact: bhattacharya.anup@gmail.comNews: Please note that I am not taking any summer interns who are not from NISER. Emails with summer internship requests will be ignored.We are organising a winter school on "Algorithmic Foundations of Data Science" at NISER, Bhubaneswar (sponsored by NISER and ACM India) from 11th December to 22nd December, 2023.
